text: William McLernon (born 1 August 1934) is an Irish equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Irish male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Ireland Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Bill McLernon
